description:
The Prime X Bindings are even lighter than before, without any compromise in stiffness and durability. Ideal for epic tours, hard-charging chutes in the backcountry and hitting the groomers, these bindings deliver an ideal combination of light weight with great stiffness. Designed to be as awesome as the boarder who rides them, these tried-and-true performance splitboard bindings are light and flexible. With the Prime X's minimal weight, you can expect the climb to be just as fun (ok, almost as fun!) as the descent. With a combination of carefully chosen material and innovative design, Karakoram manages to deliver a lightweight binding that offers the same performance as your favorite resort binding.

  • 7000-series aluminum, stainless steel, Dupont Zytel and Hytrel attest to this binding's durability
  • Reactive high back has a great strength to weight ratio
  • Flex-Lock helps provide extra support at the ankles when skinning up steep hills
  • AirPod ankle and AirStrap toe straps provides a snug fit
  • Standard splitboard mounting hole pattern
  • 2-setting heel risers are wide and easy to adjust with your pole basket
  • Open chassis doesn't interfere with your board flex
  • Included split interface transforms your splitboard into a stiff and slop-free board
  • Stance width adjusts in 1/2in. increments and accommodates angles of 30 to -30°
  • Compatible with board inserts of 3¼ to 3½in
  • Forward lean is set to -8 degrees in tour mode
  • Ride mode offers 0 to 22 degrees in 2-degree increments
  • Compatible with Karakoram Quiver-Connector, so you can use these bindings on multiple boards
name: Karakoram Prime X  Bindings+ Split Interface - Men's
